title: About Me
intro: With over 2 years of hands-on experience in payment system development, currently pursuing a Master's degree in Information Management at National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences. Proficient in the complete .NET Framework / MVC / Core technology stack and frontend development with Vue.js / JavaScript. Led payment core system development and legacy system modernization, contributed to achieving PCI DSS 4.0 international certification. Skilled in Git version control, Azure DevOps CI/CD, and GCP cloud platform. Experienced TA with a passion for technical sharing and team collaboration.

experienceList.exp1: Led payment core system development and modernization
experienceList.exp2: Contributed to achieving PCI DSS 4.0 certification
experienceList.exp3: 2+ years of payment system development experience
